original_text: Wherefore the anger of the Lord was kindled against Amaziah, and he sent unto him a prophet, which said unto him, Why hast thou sought after the gods of the people, which could not deliver their own people out of thine hand?
korean_text: 그러므로 여호와께서 아마샤에게 진노하사 한 선지자를 그에게 보내시니 그가 이르되 저 백성의 신들이 그들의 백성을 왕의 손에서 능히 구원하지 못하였거늘 왕은 어찌하여 그 신들에게 구하나이까 하며

sentences.original_text: Wherefore the anger of the Lord was kindled against Amaziah
and he sent unto him a prophet
Why hast thou sought after the gods of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 네가 어찌 그 백성의 신들을 좇았는가

sentences.original_text: which could not deliver their own people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 자기 백성도 네 손에서 구원하지 못하였거늘
